meanings.definition: A form of motorcycle racing on a rough, closed course with steep hills and obstacles.
meanings.sent1: Motocross is a thrilling race on a bumpy track with jumps.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching motocross events on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The motocross riders zoomed over the hills like daredevils.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a motocross race, full of ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The sound of motocross bikes echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The sport of competing in motocross races.
meanings.sent1: Competing in motocross requires skill and bravery.
meanings.sent2: Motocross is a popular sport among adrenaline junkies.
meanings.sent3: The motocross competition was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of motocross, every second counts.
meanings.sent5: She trained hard to excel in the world of motocross racing.

meanings.sent1: He loves to motocross on weekends with his friends.
meanings.sent2: They plan to motocross in the upcoming championship.
meanings.sent3: She decided to motocross despite her fear of speed.
meanings.sent4: Motocrossing through the muddy track was exhilarating.
meanings.sent5: The team prepared to motocross under the scorching sun.
